# og-list-template-default



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                           | Type                           | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Set the flag, it this list item is in disabled state. | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |
| `item`     | `item`     | Current item data                                     | `any`                          | `undefined` |
| `options`  | --         | Template options                                      | `OgListTemplateDefaultOptions` | `undefined` |
| `selected` | `selected` | Set the flag, if this list item is in selected state. | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description                                                                   |
| ------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--content-Height`             | Height of the content area.                                                   |
| `--content-Padding`            | Padding (inner spacing) of the content area.                                  |
| `--item-Background`            | Background of the list item (shorthand)                                       |
| `--item-Background--active`    | Background of the list item when selected (shorthand)                         |
| `--item-Background--highlight` | Background of the list item when hovered (shorthand)                          |
| `--item-BorderColor`           | Border color of the list item                                                 |
| `--item-BorderRadius`          | Border radius of the list item                                                |
| `--item-BorderStyle`           | Border style of the list item                                                 |
| `--item-BorderWidth`           | Border width of the list item                                                 |
| `--item-Color`                 | Text color of the list item                                                   |
| `--item-Cursor`                | Cursor appearance when hovered                                                |
| `--item-Margin`                | Margin (outer spacing) of the list item                                       |
| `--item-Opacity`               | Opacity of the list item                                                      |
| `--item-Opacity--disabled`     | Opacity of the list item when disabled                                        |
| `--item-PointerEvents`         | Pointer Events of the list item. Will be set to 'none' when item is disabled. |
| `--item__icon-Width`           | Width of the "prefix" icon.                                                   |
| `--item__label-FontSize`       | Fontsize of the label.                                                        |
| `--item__label-LineHeight`     | Lineheight of the label.                                                      |
| `--item__Label-Padding`        | Padding (inner spacing) of the label.                                         |
| `--item__overline-Color`       | Color of the overline.                                                        |
| `--item__overline-FontSize`    | Fontsize of the overline.                                                     |
| `--item__overline-LineHeight`  | Lineheight of the overline.                                                   |
| `--item__overline-Padding`     | Padding (inner space) of the overline.                                        |
| `--item__subline-Color`        | Color of the subline.                                                         |
| `--item__subline-FontSize`     | Fontsize of the subline.                                                      |
| `--item__subline-Padding`      | Padding (inner space) of the subline.                                         |
| `--item__value-Padding`        | Padding of the value.                                                         |
